title: Special bodhi pooja held in London to transfer merits for late Bharatha Lakshman ex MP.
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Religious observances including special Bodhi Pooja were held recently to transfer merits to late Presidential advisor on trade union affairs and former parliamentarian from Kolonnawa constituency late Bharatha Lakshman Premachandra at Thames Buddhist Vihara, South London.
